The War Trump Chooses  —  That wasn't Trump against Zelens'kyi.  It was Americans against reason  —  The Americans claim that their attempt to humiliate the Ukrainian president in the White House yesterday was about peace.  On that premise, nothing they said makes any sense.

Judge blocks Trump order threatening funding for institutions that offer care for transgender youth  —  President Donald Trump's plan to pull federal funding from institutions that provide gender-affirming care for transgender youth will remain blocked on a long-term basis under a federal judge's ruling in Seattle late Friday.
